text: Thats actually a pretty good fix for, as you said 90% of the use cases. Thanks Nishank! :pray:
Hi there. We are waiting for granular scope migration on one of our old accounts. Any idea when migration will be done? or how to force a manual migration?

Hello all. I am curious if there is a way with the v1 engagements API to get all properties? I use the v3 api to get the engagement properties and I get one back called HubSpot_owner_id which one of our customers us using to attribute emails. I would love a way to get all of these properties on the v1 engagement calls, OR migrate to a newer version, but NOT have to call seperate calls for the different engagement types. Any help here would be much appreciated!

Hi all - We opted into the beta for applying association labels between objects (e.g. Decision Maker, Advocate, etc. when associating Contacts to Deals).

I’m wondering if there’s a way to leverage these association labels in reporting as a filter.

Hi all! I’m uploading “email modules” from local to my portal, these modules belongs to emails but when I already uploaded, the modules on the emails are blank. What could be the issue? Reference issue?

Thanks!
is this channel regularly responded to?

<@U030UN8MTRQ> from my experience – _sometimes_.
it’s usually hard to respond to people in this channel bc people ask about case-specific scenarios and don’t provide enough info
Hi there HS team! I have some questions about the efficacy of the HubSpot -> Webflow integration. If this is your area of expertise, let's start a thread!

HI there, any one got any tips on how to get the number or records in a custom object via the API?
Like:
```{% set table_info = hubdb_table(1548215) %} 
{{ table_info.row_count }}```
but via the api  with custom objects and without loading any actual records.
I’ve run into this before and I could not find anything in api docs or example responses for a total count
Hi all - quick update for the thread: PATCH is likely not the issue here as this Zap is working in some cases and not in others - will keep you in the loop once I solve.
<@U021JKWA1GB> thanks for the feedback - I believe we can use either according to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects|the docs>
i am curious about the cases where it is working
How do I report a bug in the API? Are there any HubSpot staff/developers here? I created a ticket in HubSpot support but they just dodge my inquiry by saying they don't support the API..

The bug is related to forms API

Steps to reproduce:
• add plain text, bold, italic and underlined text, as well as a link to a field's label
• save form, query from API
• label's formatted content shows in form schema json
• remove previously added italic, bold, underlined and link from field's label, keep the plain text
• save form, query from API
*Expected result:* field label only contains plain text
*Actual result:* field label contains plain text AND link markup
Hi, Can anyone help here? Thanks in advance.
